name: Aurora Draughts
description:
"Aurora Draughts" is a well-known checkers database program with a built-in playing and analysing module that is incredibly convenient and easy to use. Many years of development has made this program useful and easy to understand for both experienced and amateur players, now it is available for Android platform.

Using "Aurora Draughts" you can work with 14 draughts variations (English, Italian, Russian, Brasilian, Czech, Pool, Spanish, Thai, Turkish, International, Killer, Frisian, Spantsireti and Canadian), play with advanced computer partner, analyse, easily comment games and create your own games databases!
